note.p: Civil engineer. Assistant engineer at Granton harbour, Midlothian, 1874–8; contractor’s engineer to Mr T. S. Hunter, Glasgow, from 1878.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Dunfermline Landward 2/8), 1871 (Dalkeith 9/26)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 August 2017)
UK, civil engineer records, 1820–1930 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 August 2017)
